works.description:
The copyrighted work at issue is many of the images from www.RosettaStone.com.  The main issue at hand is that each of the websites that are being reported are offering counterfeit Rosetta Stone software for sale.  Rosetta Stone Ltd. is the owner of Rosetta Stone language-learning software titles.  Each of the websites being submitted are offering counterfeit Rosetta Stone software for sale.

Each of the domains listed below are offering counterfeit Rosetta Stone software for sale.  Please do a site wide removal and block/blacklist each top level domain listed below from search results.

http://www.rosettastoneofficial.org
